alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 06 at 3:03PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Texas, including the following counties, Fort Bend and Harris. * WHEN...Until 500 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 303 PM CDT, Runoff from heavy rainfall is resulting in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bellaire, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Spring Branch West, Spring Valley, Eldridge / West Oaks, southern Addicks Park Ten, Mission Bend, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Afton Oaks / River Oaks Area, Hedwig Village, Hilshire Village, Westchase, Briar Forest, Sharpstown, Mid West, Alief, Westwood and Braeburn. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
